Title: Episode #5.2

Actors: Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Robson Green, Michelle Lukes
Plot: Scott and Mike continue to look for the ones responsible for the embassy bombing. The ambassador recovers in hospital with Chloe and his wife beside him. Mike still recovering from the sore...
